item.title: Transposing Grouped Rows into Alternating Columns
item.description: As I was strolling through reddit and came across an interesting data cleaning request by u/PoisonDaddy29. Breaking down the request, it seemed like a typical transposing problem, but with an interesting twist - with grouped data. Letâ€™s break this down a bit. This is the original sample data: sample_data And this is the expected output data: Looking at the output and working towards the original data, you will notice a couple of things:
